mapper.sql:
FROM code c inner join codeGroup cg on cg.ccgSeq = c.codeGroup_ccgSeq WHERE 1=1 AND ifccDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND ccSeq = #{shValue} AND ifccName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifccNameEng LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
select c.ccSeq ,c.ifccAnother ,c.ifccName ,c.ifccNameEng ,c.ifccUseNy ,c.ifccOrder ,c.ifccExplanation ,c.ifccDelNy ,c.ifccReferencev1 ,c.ifccReferencev2 ,c.ifccReferencev3 ,c.ifccReferenceI1 ,c.ifccReferenceI2 ,c.ifccReferenceI3 ,c.createdAt ,c.modifiedAt ,c.codeGroup_ccgSeq ,cg.ccgSeq as ccgSeq ,cg.ifcgName as ifcgName
ORDER BY c.ccSeq DESC
select c.* from code c where 1=1 AND ccSeq = #{ccSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE code SET ifccDelNy = 1 where 1=1 AND ccSeq = #{ccSeq}
mapper.select: SELECT ccSeq , ifccName , codeGroup_ccgSeq as ccgSeq FROM code WHERE 1=1 AND ifccDelNy = 0 AND ifccUseNy = 1
